org.matrix.androidsdk.call

Interface IMXCallListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MXCallListener

    public interface IMXCallListener
    This class tracks the call update.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCallAnsweredElsewhere()
      The call was answered on another device.
      void onCallEnd(int aReasonId)
      Warn that the call is ended
      void onCallError(java.lang.String error)
      Called when the call fails.
      void onCallViewCreated(android.view.View callView)
      The call view has been created.
      void onPreviewSizeChanged(int width, int height)
      The video preview size has been updated.
      void onReady()
      The call view has been inserted.
      void onStateDidChange(java.lang.String state)
      Called when the call state change

    • Method Detail

      • onStateDidChange

        void onStateDidChange(java.lang.String state)
        Called when the call state change
        Parameters:
        state - the new call state

      • onCallError

        void onCallError(java.lang.String error)
        Called when the call fails.
        Parameters:
        error - the failure reason

      • onCallViewCreated

        void onCallViewCreated(android.view.View callView)
        The call view has been created. It can be inserted in a custom parent view.
        Parameters:
        callView - the call view

      • onReady

        void onReady()
        The call view has been inserted. The call is ready to be started. For an outgoing call, use placeCall(). For an incoming call, use launchIncomingCall().

      • onCallAnsweredElsewhere

        void onCallAnsweredElsewhere()
        The call was answered on another device.

      • onCallEnd

        void onCallEnd(int aReasonId)
        Warn that the call is ended
        Parameters:
        aReasonId - the reason of the call ending

      • onPreviewSizeChanged

        void onPreviewSizeChanged(int width,
                          int height)
        The video preview size has been updated.
        Parameters:
        width - the new width (non scaled size)
        height - the new height (non scaled size)
